name: Shut The Box Deluxe
description:
Shut The Box Deluxe is an iPad version of the classic game of chance. We think it's the best looking version available. Also known as Canoga, the game is thought to have originated in England or perhaps Northern France. Wooden versions have been played for many years in pubs around the world. Our App offers options to let you play the standard game and some popular variations, especially the "Thai Rules" version popular in Asia.

Our iPhone/iTouch version is for 1 to 4 players up to 3 of whom can be computer opponents.

- Incredible graphics, smooth animations
- 3D ray-traced dice and roll animation
- Fully gesture-driven interface
- Automatic scoring for 1 to 4 players
- Up to 3 Computer-Opponents to challenge you
- Supports the single-die option when sliders 7-9 are covered
- Teach kids simple arithmetic while they play
